name: Veg Handi
history: Veg Handi is a popular Indian dish known for its rich and creamy texture. Traditionally cooked in a 'Handi' (a deep and wide-mouthed cooking vessel), this dish incorporates various vegetables and a blend of spices, embodying the essence of Indian cuisine.
description: Veg Handi is a delicious Indian curry made with an assortment of vegetables, cooked in a creamy sauce with herbs and spices. This dish is often garnished with cream or coriander and served with Indian bread or rice.

ingredients.item: mixed vegetables (carrots, peas, bell peppers, cauliflower)

instructions.title: SautÃ© Onions and Spices
instructions.description: Heat oil in a handi. Add cumin seeds and when they crackle, add onions, ginger-garlic paste, and green chilies. SautÃ© until onions are golden.

instructions.title: Add Tomato Puree and Spices
instructions.description: Stir in the tomato puree, coriander powder, turmeric powder, red chili powder, and garam masala. Cook until oil separates.

instructions.title: Cook the Vegetables
instructions.description: Add the mixed vegetables, salt, and enough water to cook the vegetables. Cover and cook until they are tender.

instructions.title: Add Cream and Kasuri Methi
instructions.description: Lower the heat and add cream or coconut milk and kasuri methi. Simmer for a few minutes.

instructions.title: Garnish and Serve
instructions.description: Garnish with chopped coriander leaves. Serve hot with naan or rice.

tips: Ensure vegetables are cut into uniform pieces for even cooking.
Adjust the spice levels according to your preference.
variations: Substitute cream with yogurt for a tangy flavor.
Add paneer or tofu cubes for added protein.

storage.shelfLife: Can be refrigerated for up to 2-3 days.
storage.instructions: Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator.

reheatingInstructions: Reheat on the stove or in a microwave until hot.
presentationTips: Serve in a traditional clay pot or handi for an authentic presentation.
Garnish with ginger juliennes or a cream swirl for added appeal.
